book_overview.premise: Tucked in a cozy Seattle foster home, 9-year-old Zara Malik mixes beats with 2025 AI tools to chase viral fame, but her ADHD muddles consonant blends in both lyrics and lessons. When a talent showcase demands perfect harmony, Zara fuses phonemic blending with electronic symphonies, crescendoing from discord to mastery and orchestrating a family band that turns reading rhythms into chart-topping triumphs.

name_age_background.name: Zara Malik
name_age_background.background: Mixed-race (South Asian and White) girl from a foster family in Seattle suburbs, Washington, with a passion for music
name_age_background.struggle: ADHD impacting phonemic awareness, specifically blending consonant sounds

personality_traits: Creative and passionate about their interest
Resilient when pursuing what they love

protagonist_profile.growth_arc: Zara struggles blending sounds in reading, frustrated by failed music auditions; breakthrough remixing tracks with phonetic cues; masters blending for complex lyrics; teaches foster siblings through group jam sessions

mentor_guide.personality: Patient, encouraging, sees potential in protagonist
